timeline.message:
refactor: jkube-kit-common decoupled from Maven

timeline.bodyText: looks like this came through autoformat
timeline.author: rohanKanojia

replies.bodyText:
This was already here: jkube/jkube-kit/common/src/main/java/org/eclipse/jkube/kit/common/util/EnvUtil.java Lines 226 to 230 in 08a546b /** * Return all properties in Maven project, merged with all System properties (-D flags sent to Maven). *

* System properties always takes precedence. * I don't know if we have any javadoc guidelines, I usually prefer the way defined in Spring code style guidelines (but doesn't make any difference): Return all properties...

System proper Most of our code is using this style, so I would let it as it is.
replies.author: manusa
